title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 337.4 - Authorization for use
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 337.4 - Authorization for use

State Regulations

Vacation shall be taken at such times as shall be
approved by the chief administrative officer. Where the chief administrative
officer, or designee, denies an employee's request for vacation, the employee, upon request, shall be given the reasons for such denial in
writing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
337.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
